list_definition.definition: a usually strong-smelling, sharp-tasting vegetable substance used to flavour/flavor food (eg pepper or nutmeg)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We added cinnamon and other spices.

list_definition.definition: anything that adds liveliness or interest

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her arrival added spice to the party.
The curry had been heavily spiced.
